Activity: Log in, check emails. Address any follow-up feedback from @prod-1 or other team members.
Make any final adjustments to character or environment designs based on feedback.
Break. Browse for new art tools or brushes to experiment with.
Prepare final submission files for all designs. Ensure they are properly labeled and organized.
Submit all finalized designs to @prod-1 and confirm receipt. Email team to notify completion of tasks.
Reflect on the week's work. Note any lessons learned or areas for improvement.
Clean up workspace, organize files, and plan for next week's tasks.
End the week by exploring new art techniques or relaxing with a creative side project.
